column2: Hey you, we got word from HQ that the General wants to speak with you. There is chopper coming to pick you up.
ALPHA BLACK TO PAPABEAR. THE RUSKIES ARE HISTORY. MEAUX IS SAFE, AGAIN. OVER.
PAPABEAR HEARS YOU. EXCELLENT JOB. OVER.
Get ready, we are picking you up now, over.
We are going to land now, go to the front gate, General is waiting for you there.
